## add() function

Sum together a series of numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function add(...nums: number[]): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nums | number\[\] | The numbers to add |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The sum of the input numbers
